name: WorldPopulationDataSheetFacts
0:
”Alexa, open world population facts”
”Alexa, start world population facts”
”Alexa, ask world population facts for a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: world population facts
des: Ask Alexa for an interesting list of facts about world population. For example, PRB Projects 2.3 billion more people living on earth by 2050 or that by midcentury, projections indicate that 16 percent of the world population will be ages 65 and older, up from 9 percent now. PRB has produced its widely referenced World Population Data Sheet (prb.org) annually since 1962.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
